Ryazani news

At the site of the construction of the Oku bridge, Ryazany began drilling

11.02.2024 23:34
According to the author of the post, the burillars are handing over the geologists samples that lie at a depth of 35 metres.

The volunteers told me about the search for Ivan Brasin.

11.02.2024 23:03
Ivana was looking for over 100 people, two search teams. People have passed 216 kilometers, 300 tips have been distributed.

The searchers published photographs from the death of a 19-year-old student, Ivan Brasin.

11.02.2024 19:08
No evidence of the criminal nature of the death occurred during the primary examination.

In Ryazani, the Sunflower competition concluded

11.02.2024 18:38
This year, participants came from Moscow, St. Petersburg, Vladimir, Kalugi, Novorosska, Novorossia, Samara, Saratova, Balashov, Tambova, Columna.

The man's body was raised from the Libbe River to Ryazani

11.02.2024 18:24
The body was removed in 16:50 on 11 February. Three persons were involved in the work, one unit of the State Fire Service.

There was a big traffic on the Razani Solochin Highway because of a furo accident.

11.02.2024 17:24
A car and a fur were hit. The truck almost blocked the road.

It became known how Ivan Brasin's body was found.

11.02.2024 17:05
The volunteers reportedly found a cap belonging to a missing person, after which the security forces were summoned.

On the Solochin highway in Ryazani, the car turned over

11.02.2024 16:59
According to the anonymous source, the accident occurred near Shumas village.

Missing in Ryazani Ivan Brasin was found dead - source

11.02.2024 16:46
The Agency ' s interlocutor said that Brasin had graduated with great success in the village of Morozov, Borki, Sápozkov district of Ryazan province.

In the Ryazan region, ice rain is expected

11.02.2024 16:41
The day is expected to be small, moderate sludges in the form of snow and wet snow, as well as ice rain, holoid and wet snow.

Missing in Ryazani Ivan Brasin was caught in surveillance cameras.

11.02.2024 16:24
We will recall that the whereabouts of a 19-year-old young man have been unknown since 9 February.

The Ryazan reported the destruction of artisanal snow during cleaning.

11.02.2024 16:12
According to the source, some of the pieces destroyed were dropped in 2023.

An ambulance accident occurred in the area of Lenin in Ryazani

11.02.2024 16:05
The UGIBD television station in Ryazan province reports that Folxwagen Polo and an ambulance were hit.

Ryazani's going to upgrade school pools

11.02.2024 11:46
School basins can play a role in disease prevention. They don't work much at Ryazani.

The Kultura television broadcast the Kasimov programme

11.02.2024 10:11
The Russian-French actor and journalist Pierre Burelle described the history of the city, local museums and local residents.

On 10 February, 4,500 Russians arrived at the launch of the Russian Federation

11.02.2024 09:04
For residents The Razani Trassa was located in the Almaz Biatlon complex at the village of Vareski.

Graduate of the Ryazan Decent School of Fishbaks died in the SVO area

11.02.2024 08:52
The warrior was forgiven on 10 February in Beloretsk.

In Ryazani, a member of the youth parliament, Ivan Brasin, disappeared.

10.02.2024 21:35
His whereabouts have not been established since 9 February.

At the entrance to Ryazsk, there was a serious accident

10.02.2024 19:10
There are DPS staff, firefighters and ambulances.

Ryazan ZAC showed photos of weddings leaving weekends

10.02.2024 16:51
The images have traditionally been published in the official unit of the Department of Contact and on the page of the head of the Elena Golina.

Bastrekin demanded that criminal proceedings be brought against a pregnant woman in Rjajska by the vagrant dogs.

10.02.2024 15:41
The woman was injured.

Mayor Kasimova read Pasternaka's poem, "To be a famous, unpleasant..."

10.02.2024 14:32
Today, the " Pancake readings " are taking place in Kasimov.

In the Ryazan region, there is a steep flow

10.02.2024 14:12
The forecast was presented by the Russian Hydromet Centre.

The fraudsters extort money on behalf of the Razian ombudsman, Epihin

10.02.2024 13:47
The villains are acting on a already familiar pattern in Telegram.

There was a " green road " between Tuma and Svalleys

10.02.2024 13:25
The picture shows how the road falls asleep with small glasses.

Who, by law, can stop a car on the road except the police.

10.02.2024 11:45
This power is vested in a number of services, and failure to comply with their legal requirements may result in difficulties.

73 private sector fires liquidated in Ryazan province

10.02.2024 11:14
Most of the fires occur for electrical reasons.

Kasimovsov added the words “AW” on the new lighting

10.02.2024 10:47
It refers to " adaptive management " .

The Golina told the story of the Nazarovs of Ryazani who celebrated 55 years of life together.

10.02.2024 09:24
The head of the GPSU continues to publish the stories of razor couples.

You'll be silent about the weather: new cemeteries are being erected in Ryazani, but the improvement of old officials is not often the case.

10.02.2024 06:05
There are 18 cemeteries in Ryazani alone and over 100 in the region. And far from all, they're not always equipped with parks, conveniences, trash and toilets.
